editedFacts.appliances: Dishwasher, Garbage disposal, Microwave, Range / Oven
editedFacts.rooms: Breakfast nook, Dining room, Laundry room, Master bath, Walk-in closet

response.homeDescription: Call Jennifer for more details 310-467-1666. Fabulous Studio City location just a few blocks from Beeman Park, Fryman Canyon, library, golf & tennis center, and Ventura Blvd! This Elegant Lumiere residence was built in 2009, and features a light and bright open floor plan with gleaming wood floors, romantic fireplace, large private terrace, inside laundry, gourmet kitchen with granite counters and stainless steel Electrolux appliances, formal dining area, master suite, dual closets. This unit is located in quiet, tranquil back of building and has a beautiful view ! Secured 2-car garage parking and guest parking. Relax and enjoy the unique amenities at The Lumiere, such as the Zen garden, outdoor fireplace, stone fountain, and the indoor fitness center and media room. Very well maintained complex with abundant pride of ownership. Convenient to everything and an Ideal address for commuting to west side or downtown. Nothing to do except move in and enjoy !
response.whatOwnerLoves: Convenient to shops, restaurants, hiking, schools, Campbell Hall, Harvard Westlake, Building and home is beautiful..
